General.Name: Ksolves India Limited
General.Description: Ksolves India Limited operates as a software development company in North America, India, Europe, and internationally. The company designs, develops, and maintains software systems and solutions; creates new applications; and enhances the functionality of its customer's existing software products, as well as provides enterprise solutions and consulting, and information technology solutions. It provides solutions and services in salesforce, java and micro services, AI and machine learning, magento development, serverless architecture, node.js development, apache kafka, Devops, apache nifi, big data, apache cassandra, MERN and MEAN Stack, apache spark, openshift, odoo development, and ruby on rail. The company serves companies across various sectors, such as real estate, E-commerce, finance, telecom, healthcare, etc. Ksolves India Limited was founded in 2012 and is based in Noida, India.
General.Address: Infinity Space, Building No. 221, Noida, India, 201301
